text: Edward is very helpful and hard working! The food came out fast, smelled delicious and was well prepared!! Thank you for being so quick and kind. I will definitely come back many more times!

text: So I ordered online and thought everything was good, paid with my credit card online too. Placed the order, only to receive a phone call 10 minutes later saying they won't have a delivery driver for 3 hours... its 330pm on a Saturday. ‚Ä¶More

text: I don't remember the girl's name but she told us she's a vegan and she had cool, funky colors in her hair. Anyways, she gave wonderful service. She was in high spirits and was the friendliest person in the building. She's lovely and is an asset to the company.

name: Metro Pc
text: Its pretty ridiculous when you LIVE IN FAIRPORT 4.5 miles FROM the Fairport pizza hut and they DONT OFFER DELIVERY TO YOUR ADDRESS!! I've always ordered from THIS LOCATION ... family gatherings, my kids birthdays, and for our pizza nights once every 2 months. 4.5 miles are you joking?! It should be ALL of Fairport.

text: The pizza was awful and the breadsticks were too hot. Nobody making the food was wearing rubber glove things. There was hair in the food. There were flies and small spider webs. The crust was weird. And we were the only people there and our food still took like an hour to make. So don't eat at this Pizza Hut.

text: Horrible service. Said they stop delivery an hour before they close the store and hung up the first time I tried to call. I wouldn't recommend this service to anyone!
